mapper.select: SELECT id, corporation_name, corporation_address, corporation_email, corporation_gen, corporation_code, created_date FROM tbl_corporation ORDER BY created_date DESC LIMIT #{pagination.startRow}, #{pagination.rowCount}

SELECT id, inquiry_type, inquiry_category, inquiry_title, inquiry_content, created_date AS createdDate, updated_date AS updatedDate, CASE WHEN member_email IS NOT NULL THEN member_email ELSE member_kakao_email END AS memberEmail FROM tbl_inquiry WHERE inquiry_type = '개인' ORDER BY createdDate DESC LIMIT #{pagination.startRow}, #{pagination.rowCount}
